name: google-sheets-bracket-generation
description: A simple tool that can generate brackets and push that bracket to a Google Sheet (initially with CTWC-styling)

scripts.validate-config: node -e "import('./src/config/bracket-config.js').then(({BracketConfig}) => { const config = BracketConfig.fromFile('./bracket-data.json'); console.log('Config Summary:', config.getSummary()); const errors = config.validate(); console.log('Validation:', errors.length === 0 ? 'PASSED' : 'ERRORS: ' + errors.join(', ')); });"
